faq.description: Everything you need to know about Merchant Directory

whatIsMerchantDirectory.question: What is Merchant Directory?
whatIsMerchantDirectory.answer: Merchant Directory is a comprehensive platform that connects customers with verified small and medium enterprises in Jakarta Selatan. We help you discover local businesses, from restaurants and cafes to retail stores and service providers.

isItFree.question: Is it free to browse the directory?
isItFree.answer: Yes! Browsing the Merchant Directory is completely free. You can search, filter, and explore all listed businesses without any charges.

doIHaveToRegister.question: Do I have to register to use the directory?
doIHaveToRegister.answer: No, you don't need to register to use the Merchant Directory. You can browse the directory and search for businesses without creating an account.

whatTypeOfBusinessCanIDiscover.question: What type of businesses can I discover?
whatTypeOfBusinessCanIDiscover.answer: We list all types of small and medium enterprises operating in Jakarta Selatan, including restaurants, cafes, retail stores, service providers, healthcare facilities, educational institutions, and more.
